mapper.insert: insert /** AdmPjtXterCfgMapper.insert */ into ADM_PJT_XTER_CFG( PJT_ID, JB_TP_CD, ITRTN_ID, BIZ_PROC_ID, IMPT_TP_CD, XTER_IP_ADDR, XTER_DMN_NM, USE_FLG, SSO_FLG, cre_usr_id, cre_dt, upd_usr_id, upd_dt ) values( #{pjtId}, #{jbTpCd}, #{itrtnId}, #{bizProcId}, #{imptTpCd}, #{xterIpAddr}, #{xterDmnNm}, #{useFlg}, #{ssoFlg}, #{createUser}, sysdate, #{updateUser}, sysdate )
mapper.update:
update /** AdmPjtXterCfgMapper.update */ ADM_PJT_XTER_CFG set
JB_TP_CD = #{jbTpCd},
ITRTN_ID = #{itrtnId},
BIZ_PROC_ID = #{bizProcId},
IMPT_TP_CD = #{imptTpCd},
XTER_IP_ADDR = #{xterIpAddr},
XTER_DMN_NM = #{xterDmnNm},
USE_FLG = #{useFlg},
SSO_FLG = #{ssoFlg},
upd_usr_id = #{updateUser}, upd_dt = sysdate where 1 = 1 and PJT_ID = #{pjtId}
